data.eml:eml: Two new species of the genus Neophyllobius Berlese (Acari: Camerobiidae) from Iran

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Khanjani, Mohammad, Fayaz, Bahman Asali, Ghanbalani, Gadir Nori (2010): Two new species of the genus Neophyllobius Berlese (Acari: Camerobiidae) from Iran. Zootaxa 2521: 53-64, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.196283
